title: [GAMEPLAY] Blitz E and R abilities can knock up-silence Fizz when he is mid-air (his E ability)
body: The title says it all, really. I can't bring myself together enough to hook you up with the footage. Need to sleep Rito, sorry.

replies.body: The Blitz E is working as intended. Fizz can't dodge the Blitz E with Fizz E once Blitz has started winding up for it.

yea, but fizz also loses his untargetability after that, making him vulnerable for all following damage **while** he is in his E animation ([video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zjtcee-OvUQ) )) is that also intended?

ps: i posted a juicy bug on reddit with Illaoi's W and teemo's blind
ok but then y can he dodge the Ekko Stun from his W (Sphere) that hes inside while hes in the air.. Fizz and Bliz op.. but fizz is wow

I believe it is because one is a no travel time spell cast on fizz himself, whereas the other is a spell cast on an area. it is like dots ticking on fizz while untargetable if they were cast on him prior, even if the first tick had not occurred when he vaulted.

There're still inconsistencies, though. Consider pantheon's stun. By your thinking, it should stun Fizz mid-air as well. But Fizz e counters Pant stun.

On the other hand Blitz's E is a skill that empowers his next basic attack. So I'd imagine it would be treated as a basic attack mechanic too. Apperantly, Riot disagrees.

Edit: A similar skill is Fizz w, for example. They both reset the aa (auto attack) timer and empower next aa. But once fizz w starts winding up, I don't think he would land the aa on another fizz, like blitz does. Neither should he, imo.
